title: Elisabetta Casellati
Member of the Senate of the Republic: Assumed office: 23 May 2018, 30 May 2001 – 15 September 2014, 15 April 1994 – 8 May 1996
Born: Maria Elisabetta Alberti ,  (1946-08-12) 12 August 1946 (age 73) , Rovigo, Italy
Political party: Forza Italia (1994-2009) , People of Freedom (2009-2013) , Forza Italia (2013-present)
